inclusion.criterion: medication expenses according to Finnish Social Insurance Institute criteria (code 203)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: asthma diagnosis confirmed at least two years previously
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: regular treatment with inhaled corticosteroids and long-acting beta-agonists for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: no changes in regular anti-asthma medication within 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: asthma is well controlled (all conditions must be fulfilled): No courses of oral corticosteroids due to asthma within one year
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: asthma is well controlled (all conditions must be fulfilled): No hospital admissions due to asthma within one year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Juniper's Asthma Control Questionnaire score equal or less than 0.75
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: the presence of another chronic respiratory disease in addition to asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of smoking more than 10 pack-years
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of asthma and is currently using inhaled corticosteroids and long-acting beta-agonists. He has not had any recent changes to his medication or hospital admissions due to asthma.
